title: Bound deep within
description: A journey into the world of domination and submission. Eric, a normal lad, is suddenly hurled into an unknown world in which he drags his friend Ellie. They each discover their "true nature" and hidden feelings thanks to the teachings of two true Masters in the art of domination. Dramatic turn of events due to a tormented past and intriguing encounters along the way, will change their lives and threaten their relationship. Will they manage to stay together or will something or someone divide them?
author: Jaden D. Laine
